summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Chapter 6. \_\_\_\_\_\_ of the Seattle Municipal Code relating to and regulating businesses purchasing, selling, trading, auctioning consignment selling, or otherwise transferring for value, used goods in the City of Seattle, by amending Sections 010, 030, 070, 080 and 100 and adding a new language, and to exempt recording of transactions between used goods dealers and their retail customers discretionary with the Chief of Police, and to exempt certain scrap metal from a holding period requirement, and to impose special regulations for scrap metal haulers, and amending Section 4 of Ordinance 109818 to correct a clerical error.
